definitions.title: coll.
definitions.body: flying creatures, fowl, insects;—´[[ע]] abs. Ge 1:20 +, cstr. v:Ge 1:21 +;—

fowl, birds, Ge 40:17, Ge 40:19 (E), Ge 7:8 (J), Ge 1:20, Ge 1:22 (P), 1Ki 5:13 +; esp. (38 t.) [[הַשָּׁמַיִם]] ´[[ע]] fowl of sky, Ge 2:19, Ge 2:20 (J), Ge 1:26, Ge 1:28, Ge 1:30 (P), Ho 2:20, Ec 10:20 +, carrion birds 1Sa 17:44, 1Sa 17:46, 2Sa 21:10, 1Ki 14:11 + 11 t.; [[הָרִים]] ´[[ע]] Ps 50:11, [[נוֹדֵד]] ´[[ע]] Is 16:2, ´[[כִּכְלוּב מָלֵא ע]] Je 5:27; redundantly [[כָּנׇף]] ´[[ע]] fowl of wing Ge 1:21 (P), Ps 78:27 (for food); for food also Le 7:26 (P), Le 17:13, Le 20:25 (both H), cf. Le 11:13, Le 11:46 (H, clean and unclean); for offering Ge 8:20 (J; [[הַטָּהוֹר]] ´[[הָע]]), Le 1:14 (P).
